metadata.title: CVE-2024-38603 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drivers/perf: hisi: hns3: Actually use devm_add_action_or_reset()pci_alloc_irq_vectors() allocates an irq vector. When devm_add_action()fails, the irq vector is not freed, which leads to a memory leak.Replace the devm_add_action with devm_add_action_or_reset to ensurethe irq vector can be destroyed when it fails.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
